snippet: “The Killing,” the twice-canceled AMC cop drama, has been renewed — this time by Netflix — for a fourth season.
abstract: AMC cop drama The Killing, twice-canceled, is given new life after being renewed, this time by Netflix, for fourth season.
lead_paragraph: “The Killing,” the twice-canceled AMC cop drama, has been renewed — this time by Netflix — for a fourth season.

headline.print_headline: Fresh Life via Netflix For ‘The Killing’
headline.main: Fresh Life via Netflix for ‘The Killing’
